article.para: The FlyMine project is building an integrated database of genomic, expression and protein data for Drosophila and Anopheles and making this available to the worldwide research community via web and bioinformatics interfaces. The FlyMine project is based at the Department of Genetics, University of Cambridge and is a collaboration between the Genetics and Biochemistry departments of the University of Cambridge.
